description: /d/E/d//a/M/a//b/I/b/ is the recipe and item viewer of choice in Icosahedreon.
It works mostly how others such as JEI would work. /b/R/b/ to view recipes, /b/U/b/ to view uses.

However, pressing the /b/"View Tree"/b/ button on a recipe will open a recipe tree viewer. From there, you can select recipes for all intermediate steps and build a full recipe tree. A use guide will appear in the bottom right of the tree viewer for more information.
And no /d/E/d//a/M/a//b/I/b/ is not an acronym. It is just pronunced EMI. (although the mod developer has provided some backronyms if it makes you feel better)
